column4: is ther a way to have more than one sound playing at the same time i.e rythembox playing music but gaim still pinging
Yes, many ways.  You could use a soundserver such as ESD, Polypaudio, ARtS, or JACK, or you could use the ALSA dmix plugin.
: thanks ill go look into that now
You know, Ubuntu comes with either ESD or Polypaudio by default, depending upon which version you're using.
